attributes.action: Grant Ronnie Biggs his Parole ,he's served long enough
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Ronnie Biggs ( The Great Train Robbery ),has been refused parole ,making it is almost certain he will die in prison.  Jack Straw yesterday announced that he would not grant Biggs his freedom for being unrepentant about his crime ,Biggs has had three strokes, he cannot speak and needs to be fed through a tube – but, in Mr Straw’s words, that he is “wholly unrepentant” for his part in the crime which took place 46 years ago. Biggs is  now 79.He should be freed to spent the rest of his days with his family .“All the other Great Train Robbers served a third of their sentences, why should Ronnie be any different.This is an injustice !

rejection.details: As stated in our terms and conditions, we cannot accept petitions on individual legal cases. Individual legal cases are a matter for direct communication with the Home Office.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
